title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Harvard starts discriminating against Asians in the name of equity. One year anniversary of George Floyd death. Year of rioting and crime continues despite Chauvin conviction. BLM and Antifa aren't the civil rights movement of the '60s, it's a socialist revolution. Psaki praises protests, calls for more "reforms." Former Minneapolis police officer: Police have been neutered. Democrats have chosen chaos and riots over law and order. Rush on how the left has turned police officers from heroes into villains in 20 years since 9/11. Heather Mac Donald: The left only cares about black lives when they're killed by cops. Scott Gottlieb says it's likely Covid-19 came from a lab. Media does 180, now speculates that virus came from the ChiComs. Rush was way ahead of the curve, speculated that coronavirus was a ChiCom weapon way back in April, 2020. Caller on police corruption sees both sides of the law and order debate.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Democrats are to blame for a year of violence after George Floyd. It's the 1970s all over again across America. Rush was way ahead of the curve on the theory that the ChiComs used covid-19 as a weapon. Rush way ahead of the curve on Xi Jinping's role in unleashing covid-19 on the world. Biden continues to push massive spending, despite rising inflation. Rush on how to combat Democrats: Don't accept the premise. Former Bush speechwriter, Never Trumper, Michael Gerson criticizes conservatives for speculating about the origins of covid-19. Rush on what made the Never Trumpers tick.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Governor DeSantis signs bill reining in Big Tech. Rush on social media censorship on various covid treatments. Big Tech must be treated like a utility. The ChiComs and Hong Kong. Marxists are determined to take down this country. Sean Lennon comes out against critical race theory. Rush way back in 2013 warned about critical race theory in schools. EIB High Note: Dog crashes track meet, wins race. Rush talks about his dogs. Portland caller on liberal craziness.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
